description.english: Find 5 fetuses.
Use your popularity to charm Jorgmahilda.
Get flushed in the toilet.
Become so unpopular that the people seek their revenge.
Initiate conversation 50 times.
Donate money 10 times to the guards.
Time to reveal the full truth.
Participate in the Court of Law.
Become a brotherkiller.
Defeat the evil that lurks in The Underworld tier 1.
Defeat the evil that lurks in The Underworld tier 2.
Defeat the evil that lurks in The Underworld tier 3.
Defeat the evil that lurks in The Underworld tier 4.
Defeat the keeper of the Brainpiece in Lowrin.
Defeat the keeper of the Brainpiece in Fargolia.
Defeat the keeper of the Brainpiece in The Hollow Mountain.
Defeat the keeper of the Brainpiece in The Eternal Home.
Get all 3 permanent upgrades for the flying slave.
Get all 3 permanent upgrades for the Frog Tribe Handgun.
Get all 3 permanent upgrades for the armshock.
Get all 3 permanent upgrades for Bogdans Breath.
Retrieve The Horn of Yonder from the depths of the Underworld.
Do as Bonk instructs: behave good.
Don't do as Bonk instructs: behave bad.
Get roasted by Bonk for your failure.
Achieve lv 50 in a dungeon.
Achieve lv 70 in a dungeon.
Achieve lv 100 in a dungeon.
Find a way to make Karl Jalmar go and visit Rasmus, so that they can fall in love.
Find all 25 skrols.
Find and deliever 30 gopi snails.
Find and deliever 30 disgusting beings.
Watch the horrors unfold.
Your mental health might never improve after this.
Find the ghost of Insholt.
Find a way to enter the childrens grave.
Collect 25 brown coins.
Play 25 hours in the same file.
Accept Margolis' proposal.
Interact with Emighuol until he tells you some valuable information about Insholts origin.
Pay the absurd amount needed to clean your house.
Find and explore the bloodied water.
Listen to Clevis' entire monologue.
Listen to Martys entire stand up routine.
Listen to the entire radio transmission.
Defeat Fergooson.
Buy the house from Raymond.
Jump as he watches you.
Deliver all the brainpieces in the Ash Hole.
Die 50 times.
Defeat Fergooson without a single death in your entire playthrough.
Explore the Dreamsinct.
Escape the Dreamsinct alive.
Find all weapons.
Find all artifacts.
Find all weapon upgrades, artifacts, skrols, gopi snails and disgusting beings.
Beat Hollow Mountain in your first try in a new save.
Beat Fargolia in your first try in a new save.
Beat Eternal Home in your first try in a new save.
Beat Lowrin in your first try in a new save.
Beat the Underworld in your first try in a new save.
Find a way to Make the guards furious.
Manage to get a magnum performance in the Underworld.
Be a man and pick up the cursed talent.
Beat the game with less than 6 hours played.
Beat the game with less than 4 hours played.
Beat the game with less than 3 hours played.
Open over 100 golden eggs.
Get over 50 frowns in a single save.
Get over 100 smiles in a single save.
Beat the game with less than 10 spins in Vunters Bazar.
Get hurt 1000 times.
Gather 10000 coin.
Gather 100000 coin.
Lose over 3000 to the death toll.
Find and defeat a daymare.
Find and defeat a giant baby.
Complete the game without picking up a single fetus.
Defeat the Sire in the Deep without taking damage.
Receive Bartholomews gift.
Find a way to burn the bush.
Use the flying slave to traverse Fritzls lands.
Let the music heal you.
Can you find his perfect hiding spot?
Get the best price at Vunters Bazar.
Get a terrible price at Vunters Bazar.
Buy 100 shopping rounds at Vunters Bazar.
Spin your aim until Finch pukes.
Get scammed by Cloig 20 times.
Mess up your run very badly in the Underworld.
Find and defeat a golden gob.
Finish the game within 1 hour and 30 minutes. Like a God!
